channel.title: CVE Feed for remix4 -- Slick Contact Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for remix4 -- Slick Contact Forms

item.title: CVE-2023-5468|2024-08-02T07:59:44.761Z -- remix4 -- slick%20contact%20forms
item.description: The Slick Contact Forms plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'dcscf-link' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 1.3.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
